name: Corvisquire

evolution.description: Corvisquire can evolve into Corviknight at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Raven Pokémon. Smart enough to use tools in battle, these Pokémon have been seen picking up rocks and flinging them or using ropes to wrap up enemies.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: This Pokémon ignores disadvantage when it relates to sight.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Opponents in combat with this Pokémon cannot eat held berries.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.description: This Pokémon's AC cannot be reduced by an opponent's moves.
